remarks: The join of 3 different atoms is a lattice plane.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-2012.)
statement:
lplni2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lplni2.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
lplni2.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
lplni2.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
lplni2 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( Q e. A /\ R e. A /\ S e. A ) /\ ( Q =/= R /\ -. S .<_ ( Q .\/ R ) ) ) -> ( ( Q .\/ R ) .\/ S ) e. P ) $.
